amendment.description: To provide an additional death gratuity to the eligible survivors of servicemembers who died between October 7, 2001, and May 11, 2005, from noncombat-related causes while on active duty.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2542 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2542 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator DeWine. (consideration: CR S12778-12791; text: CR S12784) To provide an additional death gratuity to the eligible survivors of servicemembers who died between October 7, 2001, and May 11, 2005, from noncombat-related causes while on active duty.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2542 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2542 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator DeWine.
